Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 1 Hetugocchaka » 1.4 Hetusahetukaduka » 1.4.1 Paṭiccavāra » 1.4.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 1.4.1.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
Hetugocchaka
Hetusahetukaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
127.
353Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho (cakkaṃ). Lobhaṃ paṭicca moho (cakkaṃ); paṭisandhikkhaṇe alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho. (Cakkaṃ.) (1)
354Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  hetuṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā; paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (2)
355Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—  alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho sampayuttakā ca khandhā (cakkaṃ). Lobhaṃ paṭicca moho sampayuttakā ca khandhā (cakkaṃ); paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (3)
128.
356Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
357Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  sahetuke ceva na ca hetū khandhe paṭicca hetū; paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (2)
358Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—  sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā hetu ca…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (3)
129.
359Hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  alobhañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca adoso amoho (cakkaṃ). Lobhañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca moho (cakkaṃ); paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
360Hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca hetuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (2)
361Hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—  sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca alobhañca paṭicca tayo khandhā adoso amoho ca…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (3)
362(Saṃkhittaṃ. Evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
